summary: This bill, the Veteran Caregiver Reeducation, Reemployment, and Retirement Act, aims to expand benefits for family caregivers of veterans. It extends medical care coverage, provides employment assistance including certifications and training, and expands available services. The bill mandates studies on returnship programs and incorporating former caregivers into VA employment. It also requires reports on retirement plan feasibility and the VA's support for caregivers transitioning out of caregiving.
